languages.text: "Я знала, что {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} не блещут интеллектом. Но это место... сплошь пропитано глупостью вперемешку с наихудшими вашими пороками".

traits.locale_text: "Я знала, что мон-кай не блещут интеллектом. Но это место... сплошь пропитано глупостью вперемешку с наихудшими вашими пороками".

languages.text: "I knew {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} were not overly bright. But this place... is thoroughly steeped in stupidity mixed with your kind's worst vices."
languages.original_text: "Я знала, что {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} не блещут интеллектом. Но это место... сплошь пропитано глупостью вперемешку с наихудшими вашими пороками".

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}が知性に欠けることは知っていたが、ここは…お前の種族の最悪の悪癖と底なしの愚かさに染まった反吐が出るような場所だ」
languages.original_text: "I knew {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} were not overly bright. But this place... is thoroughly steeped in stupidity mixed with your kind's worst vices."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}が知性に欠けることは知っていたが、ここは…お前の種族の最悪の悪癖と底なしの愚かさに染まった反吐が出るような場所だ」

languages.text: “我知道{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}都不怎么聪明，可这个地方……简直是完全浸泡在愚蠢之中，还夹杂着你的族群最糟糕的恶习。”
languages.original_text: "I knew {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} were not overly bright. But this place... is thoroughly steeped in stupidity mixed with your kind's worst vices."

traits.locale_text: “我知道{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}都不怎么聪明，可这个地方……简直是完全浸泡在愚蠢之中，还夹杂着你的族群最糟糕的恶习。”

languages.text: «Sabía que los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} no tenían muchas luces, que digamos. Pero es que este sitio... es un alarde de estupidez mezclada con los peores vicios de tu especie».
languages.original_text: "I knew {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} were not overly bright. But this place... is thoroughly steeped in stupidity mixed with your kind's worst vices."

traits.locale_text: «Sabía que los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} no tenían muchas luces, que digamos. Pero es que este sitio... es un alarde de estupidez mezclada con los peores vicios de tu especie».

languages.text: « Je savais que les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} n'étaient pas particulièrement intelligents, mais cet endroit mêle savamment la stupidité crasse et les pires vices de votre espèce. »
languages.original_text: "I knew {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} were not overly bright. But this place... is thoroughly steeped in stupidity mixed with your kind's worst vices."

traits.locale_text: « Je savais que les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} n'étaient pas particulièrement intelligents, mais cet endroit mêle savamment la stupidité crasse et les pires vices de votre espèce. »

languages.text: "Ich wusste ja, dass {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} nicht sonderlich klug sind. Aber dieser Ort ... ist eine Mischung aus enormer Dummheit und den schlimmsten Lastern Eurer Art."
languages.original_text: "I knew {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} were not overly bright. But this place... is thoroughly steeped in stupidity mixed with your kind's worst vices."

traits.locale_text: Ich wusste ja, dass {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh{/g}Chem-Pan-Sey{mf| nicht sonderlich klug sind. Aber dieser Ort ... ist eine Mischung aus enormer Dummheit und den schlimmsten Lastern Eurer Art."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keighlerin{/g} kafasının pek basmadığını bilirdim de burada türünüzün en beter ahlaksızlığıyla salaklık resmen el ele vermiş."
languages.original_text: "I knew {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} were not overly bright. But this place... is thoroughly steeped in stupidity mixed with your kind's worst vices."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g} çok zeki değildir, bunu zaten biliyordum ama burası türünün aptallığının, ahlaksızlığının en kötü hâliyle birleşimi gibi bir yer."
